title: 25 years on: how the UK NSC has transformed screening for the better

content.text: The UK National Screening Committee (UK NSC) first met in July 1996. In a blog article to mark the committee’s 25th anniversary, Dr Angela Raffle explains how the UK NSC has helped transform screening for the better from the ‘bad old days’ of haphazard, ineffective and harmful activities.
You can also register to receive UK NSC blog updates direct to your email inbox.
